ModMetaData.name: Simple Algae - 'VPE More Plants' Addon
ModMetaData.description: A simple mod that adds algae as a growable crop to the roster of aquatic crops added by 'Vanilla Plants Expanded - More Plants', which can be used to be distilled into biofuels, or if 'Vanilla Cooking Expanded - Sushi' is active, it will be used in recipes for sushi. This mod also tweaks the market values of chemfuel and 'dark oil' added by 'Expanded Materials - Metals'.
